document.text:
From: ' 
To: "r>, "Berman, Geoffrey 
(USANYS)" 
Subject: Fwd: FOX Business inquiry 
Date: Mon, 16 Mar 2020 15:17:33 +0000 
Inline-Images: image001.png 
Geoff: just let me know if you'd like for me to do anything other than decline. Thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: "Pagones, Stephanie" 
< 
Date: March 16, 2020 at 8:22:57 AM EDT 
To: ' 
Subject: FOX Business inquiry 
Hi, 
We're working on a story in which we speak to several former federal prosecutors and US Attorneys about the potential 
next steps in the Epstein investigation, particularly as it pertains to Prince Andrew's unwillingness to cooperate. 
One of the things that has come up from multiple people is how unusual it is for Geoffrey Berman to have spoken 
publicly about this matter, not once, but twice. 
Per one former US Attorney: "It's an unusual move because generally speaking, there is a rule, there's guidance in the 
U.S. attorney's manual that comes from the attorney general that indicates that they are not to comment." 
Full disclosure, in most, if not all cases, the people I spoke with said they would likely have done the same thing. 
That said, would you or US Atty Berman like to provide any statement or comment to be induded in the story? 
We are on deadline for 4 p.m. Monday. Thank you in advance, I hope to hear from you before then. 
Stephanie Pagones 
Digital Reporter I FOX Business 
cell: 
#steph_pagones 
FOX" 
BUSINESS 
This message and its attachments may contain legally privileged or confidential information. It is intended 
solely for the named addressee. If you are not the addressee indicated in this message (or responsible for 
delivery of the message to the addressee), you may not copy or deliver this message or its attachments to 
anyone. Rather, you should permanently delete this message and its attachments and kindly notify the sender 
by reply e-mail. Any content of this message and its attachments that does not relate to the official business of 
Fox News or Fox Business must not be taken to have been sent or endorsed by either of them. No 
representation is made that this email or its attachments are without defect. 
EFTA00025549
